snippet: The revamped Malibu, along with new pickup trucks this summer, is part of an effort by General Motors to emerge from years of retrenching after its financial collapse.
abstract: General Motors introduces revamped Chevrolet Malibu sedan, part of effort by automaker to emerge from years of lagging in important midsize car category following financial collapse; move is uncharacteristically fast major change to model that was revised just one year earlier.
lead_paragraph: The revamped Malibu, along with new pickup trucks this summer, is part of an effort by General Motors to emerge from years of retrenching after its financial collapse.

headline.seo: A New Chevrolet Malibu, Aimed at G.M.’s Rivals
headline.main: To Compete, G.M. Alters a Sedan
headline.print_headline: To Compete, G.M. Alters A Sedan
